8339.name: Dark Screen
8339.description: Dark Screen is where you find the best thrillers and horrors made. No filler, no gimmicks—just genuinely well-crafted films that know how to get under your skin. We’ve picked every title because it works, because it matters, and because it’s worth your time.

5309.name: Electric Now
5309.description: Catch your favorite TV shows, cult classic movies, and pop culture hits all day, every day with Electric Now. From iconic series to unforgettable films, it’s your go-to channel for nonstop entertainment.

8345.description:

suspense, to more.

6595.name: Western Bound
6595.description: Western Bound US: Your 24/7 destination for classic and modern Western storytelling. Immerse yourself in frontier adventures, iconic series, and cowboy legends across multiple streaming platforms. Free, authentic, and always entertaining.

6408.name: Dark Matters TV
6408.description: Dark Matter TV is your go-to channel for horror, sci-fi, action, and true crime. Packed with cult classics, hidden gems, and intense thrillers, it’s genre entertainment the way fans actually want it—bold, curated, and endlessly bingeable.

6637.description: Coming Age showcases powerful films about growing up from emerging filmmakers. We spotlight fresh voices with bold storytelling, featuring new directors and actors shaping modern cinema. Experience unique perspectives, emotional narratives, and cutting-edge creativity as the future of storytelling u

8343.name: FilmNight
8343.description: Quality films, period. FilmNight is built on one idea: showcase the movies in all these genres that are genuinely good. No filler, no compromise—just the kind of cinema that reminds you why you love watching films in the first place.

6639.name: Sooner: Next Gen
6639.description: Explore films by emerging filmmakers who bring new talents and innovative views to the screen. Discover the directors and actors shaping the future of cinema with their unique and impactful storytelling.

7529.description: Beyond Paranormal is a 24/7 channel exploring ghosts, hauntings, UFOs, cryptids, and unexplained phenomena through chilling docu‑series, documentaries, and vodcasts that dive into the world of the supernatural.

7061.description: 24/7 high-def streaming channel showcasing breathtaking wildlife documentaries, exotic habitats, and rare animal encounters from around the globe.

7017.name: Unleashed by DOGTV
7017.description: Unleashed by DOGTV is the ultimate free streaming channel for dog lovers. We’ve got expert training, wellness tips, adoption stories, heartwarming rescues, fun dog-umentaries, family-friendly shows, and lifestyle content-24/7, all about pups and their people.

7043.name: INWILD

7041.description: INTROUBLE is Insight TV’s action and sports FAST channel, featuring adrenaline-fueled content like extreme sports, motorsports, and adventure series for Millennial and Gen-Z viewers seeking excitement and real-life stories

6589.description:
TeenVee is two incredible shows! Teen-Z tells hilarious stories about students
as they make friends and get into plenty of awkward situations. Avocado Couple combines animation
and humour to highlight the many aspects of relationships.

5748.name: KIDDO+
5748.description: KIDDO+ TV Channel offers 24/7 streaming of engaging movies and series for kids, featuring animation and family-friendly content tailored for young audiences. Tune in today!

8341.description: Bommi & Friends” is an edutainment series for children and parents, following the adventures of a girl named Bommi and her friends in each episode. Through fun and imaginative stories, it teaches values, builds confidence, and makes learning a joyful family experience.

7269.name: Wine, Watches & Whiskey
7269.description: Sip, savor, and splurge with Wine, Watches & Whiskey—a refined escape into rare vintages, timeless timepieces, and top-shelf spirits. Where luxury meets obsession, 24/7. Taste life’s finer things, only on STIRR.

6587.name: Slick Slime Sam
6587.description:
Meet Slick Slime Sam! The most entertaining slime in history and his "pet
human" Sue help with your latest DIY or life hack project, cook incredible food and work together to
find common ground. Sam is pink, hilarious and ready to get to work!

6585.description:

7275.description: Taste the world, one show at a time. Cuisine & Culture serves up global flavors, culinary adventures, and the stories behind every dish. From street food to fine dining, discover what brings us together—deliciously, every day.
